category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: METimeSystemSearchCriterionFields
preference.preference_description: Specifies the time system fields that can be searched for. The fields can be grouped in different configurations. Each value (or configuration) must have the format "configuration:field_1,field_2,...,field_n", where "configuration" is the configuration name and "field_i" is the time system field. The fields appear in the default configuration if the "configuration" section of the preference value is empty.
